Uses of Interface
se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config.HandlerConfiguration

  • Packages that use HandlerConfiguration 
    Package Description
    se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config
    Core interfaces and classes for handling configuration of SignService handlers and engines.

    • Uses of HandlerConfiguration in se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config

      Classes in se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config that implement HandlerConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractHandlerConfiguration<T extends SignServiceHandler>
      An abstract base class for HandlerConfigurationÂ implementations that handles the base functionality for a configuration object.
      class  BeanReferenceHandlerConfiguration<T extends SignServiceHandler>
      A BeanReferenceHandlerConfiguration class is used when no actual handler configuration is made and instead an already configured bean of the particular handler type is referenced using AbstractHandlerConfiguration.setBeanName(String).
      Methods in se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config that return HandlerConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      HandlerConfiguration<T> AbstractHandlerConfiguration.getDefaultConfig()
      Gets the assigned default configuration.
      HandlerConfiguration<T> HandlerConfiguration.getDefaultConfig()
      Gets the assigned default configuration.

      Merges the supplied default configuration into this object.
      void AbstractHandlerConfiguration.setDefaultConfig​(HandlerConfiguration<T> defaultConfig)
      In many cases, handlers of the same type share many configuration settings.
      void BeanReferenceHandlerConfiguration.setDefaultConfig​(HandlerConfiguration<T> defaultConfig)
      Only beanName may be assigned for custom handler configuration classes, so invoking this method will lead to an IllegalArgumentException being thrown.
      void HandlerConfiguration.setDefaultConfig​(HandlerConfiguration<T> defaultConfig)

      Method parameters in se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config with type arguments of type HandlerConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AbstractHandlerConfiguration.resolveDefaultConfigRef​(Function<String,​HandlerConfiguration<T>> resolver)
      If a default configuration reference has been assigned (needsDefaultConfigResolving() returns true) the reference needs to be resolved into a HandlerConfiguration object, and this object needs to be merged with our configuration instance.
      void HandlerConfiguration.resolveDefaultConfigRef​(Function<String,​HandlerConfiguration<T>> resolver)
      If a default configuration reference has been assigned (needsDefaultConfigResolving() returns true) the reference needs to be resolved into a HandlerConfiguration object, and this object needs to be merged with our configuration instance.
